name: Far Cry 4 Demo
description:
To play this game on PS5, your system may need to be updated to the latest system software. Although this game is playable on PS5, some features available on PS4 may be absent. See PlayStation.com/bc for more details.
DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS TRIAL UNLESS YOU’VE RECEIVED A “KEY TO KYRAT” FROM A FRIEND. THIS TRIAL WILL ONLY WORK AFTER YOU HAVE A KEYS TO KYRAT INVITE.


For more information visit FarCryGame.com/KeystoKyrat


Purchasing this content on PS3 entitles you to a free PS4 Digital Version upgrade!


SEQUEL TO THE 1 RATED SHOOTER OF 2012*


In Far Cry 4, players find themselves in Kyrat, a breathtaking, perilous and wild region of the Himalayas struggling under the regime of a despotic self-appointed king. Using a vast array of weapons, vehicles, and animals, players will write their own story across an exotic open-world landscape.


*Based on Metacritic as of 12/18/2012
